p: Fatty acids were determined indirectly using their corresponding methyl esters. The oil (0.2 g) was saponified for 30 min under reflux with a potassium hydroxide solution in methanol, following the method described by Hartman and Lago [ 11]. After adequate treatment and pH adjustment, the free fatty acids were methylated with methanol via acid catalysis in order to yield the respective methyl esters.
